rcloneOperation.noVdisks: No vdisks set in config file.
rcloneOperation.deleteVdisk: Are you sure you want to delete ${name}? this action is irreversible!

createVdisk.title: Create Remote Disk
createVdisk.description: Create a remote disk, if you don't understand the options here, please seek help.
createVdisk.name: Name
createVdisk.mountPointHint: Mount point of the disk on your system
createVdisk.enableAutoMountHint: Auto mount this disk after rclone starts

firstLaunch.intro: Welcome to use OpenList-Desktop, let's get started!
firstLaunch.about: Click here to learn more about OpenList-Desktop!
firstLaunch.chooseTheme: First, let's choose your preferred theme here!
firstLaunch.chooseDirectory: Second, you have to get an OpenList and tell the OpenList-Desktop where it is!
firstLaunch.autoInstall: OpenList-Desktop now supports automatic installation of ${name}, try it out!
firstLaunch.getAlist: Want to use a specific version of OpenList or install it manually? Click here!
firstLaunch.finish: Finish! You can change these settings in settings!

saveWindowPlacement.title: Save window placement
saveWindowPlacement.description: This will allow OpenList-Desktop save window placement.

minimizeToTray.title: Allow minimize to tray
minimizeToTray.description: This will allow OpenList-Desktop to minimize to tray.

autoStart.title: Allow auto start
autoStart.description: This will allow OpenList-Desktop auto start.

autoStartLaunchMinimized.title: Allow silent auto start
autoStartLaunchMinimized.description: This will allow OpenList-Desktop auto start silently.

autoStartAlist.title: Allow OpenList auto start
autoStartAlist.description: This will auto start OpenList when OpenList-Desktop starts.

autoStartLaunchMinimized.title: Allow silent auto start
autoStartLaunchMinimized.description: This will allow OpenList-Desktop auto start silently.

workingDirectory.title: Working Directory
workingDirectory.hint: It's a Directory, not a File!

argumentsList.title: Arguments List
argumentsList.descriptionForRclone: Edit startup arguments for rclone. If you don't understand the options here, please seek help.

proxy.title: Http Proxy
proxy.hint: If left blank, it will not be enabled

rcloneSettings.title: Rclone Options
rcloneSettings.rcloneDirNotSet: You can mount your web drives on your computer using rclone. However, the Rclone Directory has not been set yet. Please go to the settings and configure the Rclone Directory to proceed.
rcloneSettings.rcloneWebdavNotSet: You can mount your web drives on your computer using rclone. However, the WebDav account for accessing OpenList has not been set yet. Please go to the settings and configure the WebDav account to proceed.

autoStartAlist.title: Allow rclone auto start
autoStartAlist.description: This will auto start rclone when OpenList-Desktop starts.

startAfterAlist.title: Requires to start after OpenList starts
startAfterAlist.description: This will require rclone to start after OpenList starts.

upgrade.clickToCheck: Click the button next to check for updates
upgrade.canUpgrade: A new version is available, do you want to upgrade?
upgrade.noUpgrade: You are using the latest version.
upgrade.selectPackage: Select the update package you want to download.
upgrade.networkError: Loading... If it hasn't loaded for a long time, please check your network and try again.
